synopsis: In this heartfelt episode, Devam and Ahir dive deep into the complexities of anxiety, sharing personal experiences and insights on how it shapes their lives. They explore the importance of understanding and accepting emotions, while also emphasizing the value of vulnerability and connection in overcoming mental health challenges.
quotes: You don't have to worry about this; there's nothing wrong.
It's okay to embrace your sadness; it's a part of being human.
Anxiety is like a fog; beneath it lies the truth of who you are.
Every day gets a little easier, but you got to do it every day—that's the hard part.
We often equate being anxious about something with caring about it, but that's not necessarily true.
It's not just about how well you fight it, but about taking that effort every day.
Our feelings are how we engage with the world and make it meaningful.
You can’t control everything, but you can control how you respond to it.
The struggle might be new every day, but the journey gets better over time.
It's essential to treat yourself with the same compassion you would offer a friend.
